description:
Set up, monitor, and view the status of your QNAP external RAID devices.

With the QNAP External RAID Manager you can set up, monitor, and view the status of your QNAP external RAID devices (such as the TR-004). All device events are recorded and desktop notifications will be sent if a system alert occurs.
[Enhancement]
- Added a reminder message when upgrading firmware to notify users that there should be no I/O activity on the TR during the upgrade.
- Added a debug log recording to provide more detailed troubleshooting information.
- Adjusted the firmware update page strings to enhance user experience.
